Context: Design Dextran sodium sulfate (DSS) colitis was induced in mice globally deficient in either IL-1α or IL-1β, and in wild-type mice, or in mice with conditional deletion of IL-1α in intestinal epithelial cells (IECs).
METHODS Mice C57BL/6 wild type (WT) mice were purchased from Harlan Laboratories (Rehovot, Israel).
